item.title: ‘Haunted Hotel’ Review: Netflix’s Blandly Pleasant Ghost Cartoon Struggles to Leave a Mark
item.description: Dan Harmon serves as executive producer on an animated comedy starring Will Forte, Eliza Coupe and Skyler Gisondo, from ‘Rick and Morty’ alum Matt Roller.

item.title: ‘Haunted Hotel’ Review: Netflix’s Blandly Pleasant Ghost Cartoon Struggles to Leave a Mark
item.description: Dan Harmon serves as executive producer on an animated comedy starring Will Forte, Eliza Coupe and Skyler Gisondo, from ‘Rick and Morty’ alum Matt Roller.

item.title: ‘Coyote vs. Acme’ Debuts First Footage as Will Forte Reflects on Salvaged Film: “I Had Given Up Hope”
item.description: During its Comic-Con panel, the movie’s team celebrated the Looney Tunes feature finally getting a release date after it was scrapped by Warner Bros.

item.title: ‘Coyote vs. Acme’ Debuts First Footage as Will Forte Reflects on Salvaged Film: “I Had Given Up Hope”
